headline: Stellantis, CATL to Invest $4.33 Billion in EV Battery Plant in Spain
summary: The companies said production is planned to start by end of 2026 and the plant could reach 50 gigawatt hours of capacity.

headline: Bear of the Day: Ford Motor (F)
summary: Despite its storied history, Ford Motor faces significant headwinds, including missed earnings, slowing EV demand, and increased competition from Tesla and other automakers. Additionally, persistent quality issues will likely weigh on the stock over the coming months.
